specialRules.hint: This model and up to half of the units in your army may be deployed from Ambush at up to 3” from enemy units (must deploy within 3” of the hero).
specialRules.name: Drill
specialRules.label: Drill
specialRules.description: This model and up to half of the units in your army may be deployed from Ambush at up to 3” from enemy units (must deploy within 3” of the hero).

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12” get +1 to their melee rolls.
specialRules.name: Grudge
specialRules.label: Grudge
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12” get +1 to their melee rolls.

specialRules.hint: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.
specialRules.name: Slayer
specialRules.label: Slayer
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.hint: The hero may ignore the Slow rule.
specialRules.name: Swift
specialRules.label: Swift
specialRules.description: The hero may ignore the Slow rule.

spells.name: Spite Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Smiting Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Battle Rune
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +6” next time it moves.

spells.name: Breaking Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Drill Rune
spells.effect: Target piece of terrain within 6” may be moved by up to 6” in any direction or may be removed from play.

spells.name: Cleaving Rune
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 12” take 6 automatic hits each.
